meanings.definition: A person who is excessively concerned with environmental issues.
meanings.sent1: The ecofreak organized a beach cleanup to protect the ocean.
meanings.sent2: My friend is such an ecofreak that she always carries a reusable water bottle.
meanings.sent3: The ecofreak joked that they would hug every tree in the forest to save the planet.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the ecofreak of the neighborhood, always planting new trees.
meanings.sent5: The ecofreak's passion for recycling was contagious to everyone around them.

meanings.definition: To behave in an extreme or fanatical manner regarding environmental conservation.
meanings.sent1: I ecofreaked out when I saw someone littering in the park.
meanings.sent2: Please don't ecofreak and turn off the lights when you leave the room.
meanings.sent3: He tends to ecofreak whenever he sees plastic straws being used.
meanings.sent4: The company decided to ecofreak by implementing a zero-waste policy.
meanings.sent5: She ecofreaks by biking to work every day instead of driving.
